Nerangs.ab: aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm xšnūman ān ī bēd dō bār wizārdan agar ahlawān bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō bē gōwišn tā yasnąsca vaɱąsca pad gāhānbār aṣ̌aiia daδąmi raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiōi.zarəmiiehe raθβō ayāb ān gāh ī bēd aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō tā sarəδanąmca raθβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm gāh ān bēd maiδiiōi.zarəmiiehe raθβō aōxtō.nānmanō yazatahe

"At aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca xšnūmaine ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋᵛhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm, they should utter the corresponding šnūman twice. If (the liturgy) is for the ahlawān, they have to recite auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō until yasnąsca vaɱąsca. In the case of a Gāhānbār, (they should recite) aṣ̌aiia daδąmi raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō maiδiiōi.zarəmiiehe raθβō or the corresponding gāh (and continue with) aṣ̌aiia daδąmi aēsma baōiδi tauua āϑrō ahurahe mazdā̊ puϑra imąm aŋhuiiąmca aṣ̌aiiąmca raϑβąmca ratufritīmca xšnūmaine raϑβō bərəzatō until sarəδanąmca raθβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm and the corresponding gāh (e.g.) maiδiiōi.zarəmiiehe raθβō aōxtō.nānmanō yazatahe."
